images.copyright: The Taj Mahal in Agra for India's Republic Day (© Michele Falzone/plainpicture)
images.title: It's Republic Day in India
images.caption: It's Republic Day in India
images.desc: For India's 70th Republic Day, we're featuring an uncommon view of the Taj Mahal in Agra. It's on this day that India celebrates its official beginning as an independent democratic republic after having endured nearly a century of British rule. Republic Day events include presentations of the Padma Awards (national service honors), a Republic Day parade in New Delhi, and other ceremonies.
